**/build/

# Crashlytics configuations
com_crashlytics_export_strings.xml

# Local configuration file (sdk path, etc)
local.properties

.gradle/

# Signing files
.signing/

.idea/libraries/
.idea/workspace.xml

*.iml

.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

/proguard/

*.log

*.class

/libs/*.jar

.gradle
.idea
/.idea

# Android Studio project specific files
local.properties
*.iml

# Log Files
*.log

# Android Studio
/captures/
/navigation/ 

# Android NDK
.externalNativeBuild

# Windows thumbnail db
Thumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Synology Diskstation
@eaDir/

# Thumbnails
._*
.DS_Store

# A Mac custom folder icon file
Icon?

# Git
/.git

/app/release/

/app/build/
